DOC.brief_title: Patient Controlled Epidural Analgesia Versus Continuous Epidural Infusion : Obstetrical Neonatal Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: Women first pregnancy spontaneous labor desire epidural anesthesia randomize one three group . Each group initially give intrathecal bolus . Before 30 minute initial bolus , patient 's verbal pain score record . The continuous epidural infusion group ( Group I ) start immediately continuous pump infusion.They also opportunity give PCA bolus Finally , patient control epidural group ( Group III ) able give bolus every 20 minute continuous infusion . Each group also allow 2 bolus , anesthesia staff event pain control indicated study medication . An hourly evaluation verbal pain score maternal mobility record . After delivery , obstetrical outcome , neonatal outcome , anesthesia intervention , patient satisfaction questionnaire collect .
